item.title: How Tibet's Peaceful Nation-Building Challenges Chinese Rule
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: Despite relentless conquests, the struggle for Tibetâ€™s sovereignty extends beyond the protection of its heritage; it's a fight for the nation's very spirit, enduring as the mountains that embrace it.
